com.appiancorp.exceptions

Class AppianError.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appiancorp.exceptions.AppianError.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    AppianError

    public static class AppianError.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder to create instances of AppianError. For errors based on an ErrorCode, ValidationItem, AppianException, etc, instead of calling this builder, use AppianErrorBuilder.
